original: 14,044.001 brahmovāca

original: 14,044.002a ahaḥ pūrvaṃ tato rātrir māsāḥ śuklādayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: 14,066.011a akāmaṃ tvā kariṣyāmi brahmabandho narādhama

original: 14,077.008c kathaṃ tan na mṛṣeha syād dharmarājavacaḥ śubham
analyzed: katham tat na mṛṣā iha syāt dharmarāja vacaḥ śubham

original: 14,077.009a na hanyeraṃś ca rājāno rājñaś cājñā kṛtā bhavet
analyzed: na hanyeran ca rājānaḥ rājñaḥ ca ājñā kṛtā bhavet

original: 14,077.009c iti saṃcintya sa tadā bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ
analyzed: iti saṃcintya sa tadā bhrātuḥ priya hite rataḥ

original: 14,077.009e provāca vākyaṃ dharmajñaḥ saindhavān yuddhadurmadān
analyzed: provāca vākyam dharma jñaḥ saindhavān yuddha durmadān

original: 14,077.010a bālān striyo vā yuṣmākaṃ na haniṣye vyavasthitān
analyzed: bālān striyaḥ vā yuṣmākam na haniṣye vyavasthitān

original: 14,077.010c yaś ca vakṣyati saṃgrāme tavāsmīti parājitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca vakṣyati saṃgrāme tava asmi iti parājitaḥ

original: 14,077.011a etac chrutvā vaco mahyaṃ kurudhvaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacaḥ mahyam kurudhvam hitam ātmanaḥ

original: 14,077.011c ato 'nyathā kṛcchragatā bhaviṣyatha mayārditāḥ
analyzed: atas nyathā kṛcchra gatāḥ bhaviṣyatha mayā arditāḥ

original: 14,077.012a evam uktvā tu tān vīrān yuyudhe kurupuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tān vīrān yuyudhe kuru puṃgavaḥ

original: 14,077.012c atvarāvān asaṃrabdhaḥ saṃrabdhair vijigīṣubhiḥ
analyzed: a tvarāvān a saṃrabdhaḥ saṃrabdhaiḥ vijigīṣubhiḥ

original: 14,077.013a tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
analyzed: tatas śata sahasrāṇi śarāṇām nata parvaṇām

original: 14,077.013c mumucuḥ saindhavā rājaṃs tadā gāṇḍīvadhanvani
analyzed: mumucuḥ saindhavāḥ rājan tadā gāṇḍīvadhanvani

original: 14,077.014a sa tān āpatataḥ krūrān āśīviṣaviṣopamān
analyzed: sa tān āpatataḥ krūrān āśīviṣa viṣa upamān

original: 14,077.014c ciccheda niśitair bāṇair antaraiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: ciccheda niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ antarā eva dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,077.015a chittvā tu tān āśugamān kaṅkapatrāñ śilāśitān
analyzed: chittvā tu tān āśu gamān kaṅkapatrām śilā śitān

original: 14,077.015c ekaikam eṣa daśabhir bibheda samare śaraiḥ
analyzed: ekaikam eṣa daśabhiḥ bibheda samare śaraiḥ

original: 14,077.016a tataḥ prāsāṃś ca śaktīś ca punar eva dhanaṃjaye
analyzed: tatas prāsān ca śaktīḥ ca punar eva dhanaṃjaye

original: 14,077.016c jayadrathaṃ hataṃ smṛtvā cikṣipuḥ saindhavā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: jayadratham hatam smṛtvā cikṣipuḥ saindhavāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: 14,077.017a teṣāṃ kirīṭī saṃkalpaṃ moghaṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: teṣām kirīṭī saṃkalpam mogham cakre mahā manāḥ

original: 14,077.017c sarvāṃs tān antarā chittvā mudā cukrośa pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: sarvān tān antarā chittvā mudā cukrośa pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 14,077.018a tathaivāpatatāṃ teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ jayagṛddhinām
analyzed: tathā eva āpatatām teṣām yodhānām jaya gṛddhinām

original: 14,077.018c śirāṃsi pātayām āsa bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
analyzed: śirāṃsi pātayām āsa bhallaiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 14,077.019a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ caiva punar eva ca dhāvatām
analyzed: teṣām pradravatām ca eva punar eva ca dhāvatām

original: 14,077.019c nivartatāṃ ca śabdo 'bhūt pūrṇasyeva mahodadheḥ
analyzed: nivartatām ca śabdaḥ bhūt pūrṇasya iva mahā udadheḥ

original: 14,077.020a te vadhyamānās tu tadā pārthenāmitatejasā
analyzed: te vadhyamānāḥ tu tadā pārthena amita tejasā

original: 14,077.020c yathāprāṇaṃ yathotsāhaṃ yodhayām āsur arjunam
analyzed: yathāprāṇam yathotsāham yodhayām āsuḥ arjunam

original: 14,077.021a tatas te phalgunenājau śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
analyzed: tatas te phalgunena ājau śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 14,077.021c kṛtā visaṃjñā bhūyiṣṭhāḥ klāntavāhanasainikāḥ
analyzed: kṛtāḥ visaṃjñāḥ bhūyiṣṭhāḥ klānta vāhana sainikāḥ

original: 14,077.022a tāṃs tu sarvān pariglānān viditvā dhṛtarāṣṭrajā
analyzed: tān tu sarvān pariglānān viditvā dhṛtarāṣṭra jā

original: 14,077.022c duḥśalā bālam ādāya naptāraṃ prayayau tadā
analyzed: duḥśalā bālam ādāya naptāram prayayau tadā

original: 14,077.022e surathasya sutaṃ vīraṃ rathenānāgasaṃ tadā
analyzed: surathasya sutam vīram rathena anāgasam tadā

original: 14,077.023a śāntyarthaṃ sarvayodhānām abhyagacchata pāṇḍavam
analyzed: śānti artham sarva yodhānām abhyagacchata pāṇḍavam

original: 14,077.023c sā dhanaṃjayam āsādya mumocārtasvaraṃ tadā
analyzed: sā dhanaṃjayam āsādya mumoca ārta svaram tadā

original: 14,077.023e dhanaṃjayo 'pi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanur visasṛje prabhuḥ
analyzed: dhanaṃjayaḥ pi tām dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ visasṛje prabhuḥ

original: 14,077.024a samutsṛṣṭadhanuḥ pārtho vidhivad bhaginīṃ tadā
analyzed: samutsṛṣṭa dhanuḥ pārthaḥ vidhivat bhaginīm tadā

original: 14,077.024c prāha kiṃ karavāṇīti sā ca taṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: prāha kim karavāṇi iti sā ca tam vākyam abravīt

original: 14,077.025a eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha svasrīyasyātmajaḥ śiśuḥ
analyzed: eṣa te bharata śreṣṭha svasrīyasya ātmajaḥ śiśuḥ

original: 14,077.025c abhivādayate vīra taṃ paśya puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: abhivādayate vīra tam paśya puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 14,077.026a ity uktas tasya pitaraṃ sa papracchārjunas tadā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tasya pitaram sa papraccha arjunaḥ tadā

original: 14,077.026c kvāsāv iti tato rājan duḥśalā vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kva asau iti tatas rājan duḥśalā vākyam abravīt

original: 14,077.027a pitṛśokābhisaṃtapto viṣādārto 'sya vai pitā
analyzed: pitṛ śoka abhisaṃtaptaḥ viṣāda ārtaḥ sya vai pitā

original: 14,077.027c pañcatvam agamad vīra yathā tan me nibodha ha
analyzed: pañcatvam agamat vīra yathā tat me nibodha ha

original: 14,077.028a sa pūrvaṃ pitaraṃ śrutvā hataṃ yuddhe tvayānagha
analyzed: sa pūrvam pitaram śrutvā hatam yuddhe tvayā anagha

original: 14,077.028c tvām āgataṃ ca saṃśrutya yuddhāya hayasāriṇam
analyzed: tvām āgatam ca saṃśrutya yuddhāya haya sāriṇam

original: 14,077.028e pituś ca mṛtyuduḥkhārto 'jahāt prāṇān dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: pituḥ ca mṛtyu duḥkha ārtaḥ jahāt prāṇān dhanaṃjaya

original: 14,077.029a prāpto bībhatsur ity eva nāma śrutvaiva te 'nagha
analyzed: prāptaḥ bībhatsuḥ iti eva nāma śrutvā eva te nagha

original: 14,077.029c viṣādārtaḥ papātorvyāṃ mamāra ca mamātmajaḥ
analyzed: viṣāda ārtaḥ papāta urvyām mamāra ca mama ātmajaḥ

original: 14,077.030a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ tatas tasyātmajaṃ vibho
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā nipatitam tatas tasya ātmajam vibho

original: 14,077.030c gṛhītvā samanuprāptā tvām adya śaraṇaiṣiṇī
analyzed: gṛhītvā samanuprāptā tvām adya śaraṇa eṣiṇī

original: 14,077.031a ity uktvārtasvaraṃ sā tu mumoca dhṛtarāṣṭrajā
analyzed: iti uktvā ārta svaram sā tu mumoca dhṛtarāṣṭra jā

original: 14,077.031c dīnā dīnaṃ sthitaṃ pārtham abravīc cāpy adhomukham
analyzed: dīnā dīnam sthitam pārtham abravīt ca api adhomukham

original: 14,077.032a svasāraṃ mām avekṣasva svasrīyātmajam eva ca
analyzed: svasāram mām avekṣasva svasrīya ātmajam eva ca

original: 14,077.032c kartum arhasi dharmajña dayāṃ mayi kurūdvaha
analyzed: kartum arhasi dharma jña dayām mayi kuru udvaha

original: 14,077.032e vismṛtya kururājānaṃ taṃ ca mandaṃ jayadratham
analyzed: vismṛtya kuru rājānam tam ca mandam jayadratham

original: 14,077.033a abhimanyor yathā jātaḥ parikṣit paravīrahā
analyzed: abhimanyoḥ yathā jātaḥ parikṣit para vīra hā

original: 14,077.033c tathāyaṃ surathāj jāto mama pautro mahābhuja
analyzed: tathā ayam surathāt jātaḥ mama pautraḥ mahā bhuja

original: 14,077.034a tam ādāya naravyāghra saṃprāptāsmi tavāntikam
analyzed: tam ādāya nara vyāghra saṃprāptā asmi tava antikam

original: 14,077.034c śamārthaṃ sarvayodhānāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
analyzed: śama artham sarva yodhānām śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ mama

original: 14,077.035a āgato 'yaṃ mahābāho tasya mandasya pautrakaḥ
analyzed: āgataḥ yam mahā bāho tasya mandasya pautrakaḥ

original: 14,077.035c prasādam asya bālasya tasmāt tvaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: prasādam asya bālasya tasmāt tvam kartum arhasi

original: 14,077.036a eṣa prasādya śirasā mayā sārdham ariṃdama
analyzed: eṣa prasādya śirasā mayā sārdham ariṃdama

original: 14,077.036c yācate tvāṃ mahābāho śamaṃ gaccha dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yācate tvām mahā bāho śamam gaccha dhanaṃjaya

original: 14,077.037a bālasya hatabandhoś ca pārtha kiṃ cid ajānataḥ
analyzed: bālasya hata bandhoḥ ca pārtha kim cit a jānataḥ

original: 14,077.037c prasādaṃ kuru dharmajña mā manyuvaśam anvagāḥ
analyzed: prasādam kuru dharma jña mā manyu vaśam anvagāḥ

original: 14,077.038a tam anāryaṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ ca vismṛtyāsya pitāmaham
analyzed: tam anāryam nṛśaṃsam ca vismṛtya asya pitāmaham

original: 14,077.038c āgaskāriṇam atyarthaṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: āgaskāriṇam atyartham prasādam kartum arhasi

original: 14,077.039a evaṃ bruvatyāṃ karuṇaṃ duḥśalāyāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvatyām karuṇam duḥśalāyām dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,077.039c saṃsmṛtya devīṃ gāndhārīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pārthivam
analyzed: saṃsmṛtya devīm gāndhārīm dhṛtarāṣṭram ca pārthivam

original: 14,077.039e provāca duḥkhaśokārtaḥ kṣatradharmaṃ vigarhayan
analyzed: provāca duḥkha śoka ārtaḥ kṣatra dharmam vigarhayan

original: 14,077.040a dhik taṃ duryodhanaṃ kṣudraṃ rājyalubdhaṃ ca māninam
analyzed: dhik tam duryodhanam kṣudram rājya lubdham ca māninam

original: 14,077.040c yatkṛte bāndhavāḥ sarve mayā nītā yamakṣayam
analyzed: yad kṛte bāndhavāḥ sarve mayā nītāḥ yama kṣayam

original: 14,077.041a ity uktvā bahu sāntvādi prasādam akaroj jayaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā bahu sāntva ādi prasādam akarot jayaḥ

original: 14,077.041c pariṣvajya ca tāṃ prīto visasarja gṛhān prati
analyzed: pariṣvajya ca tām prītaḥ visasarja gṛhān prati

original: 14,077.042a duḥśalā cāpi tān yodhān nivārya mahato raṇāt
analyzed: duḥśalā ca api tān yodhān nivārya mahataḥ raṇāt

original: 14,077.042c saṃpūjya pārthaṃ prayayau gṛhān prati śubhānanā
analyzed: saṃpūjya pārtham prayayau gṛhān prati śubha ānanā

original: 14,077.043a tataḥ saindhavakān yodhān vinirjitya nararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: tatas saindhavakān yodhān vinirjitya nara ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 14,077.043b*0151_01 evaṃ nirjitya tān vīrān saindhavān sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: evam nirjitya tān vīrān saindhavān sa dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,077.043c punar evānvadhāvat sa taṃ hayaṃ kāmacāriṇam
analyzed: punar eva anvadhāvat sa tam hayam kāma cāriṇam

original: 14,077.044a sasāra yajñiyaṃ vīro vidhivat sa viśāṃ pate
analyzed: sasāra yajñiyam vīraḥ vidhivat sa viśām pate

original: 14,077.044c tārāmṛgam ivākāśe devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
analyzed: tārāmṛgam iva ākāśe devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk

original: 14,077.045a sa ca vājī yatheṣṭena tāṃs tān deśān yathāsukham
analyzed: sa ca vājī yatheṣṭena tān tān deśān yathāsukham

original: 14,077.045c vicacāra yathākāmaṃ karma pārthasya vardhayan
analyzed: vicacāra yathākāmam karma pārthasya vardhayan

original: 14,077.046a krameṇa sa hayas tv evaṃ vicaran bharatarṣabha
analyzed: krameṇa sa hayaḥ tu evam vicaran bharata ṛṣabha

original: 14,077.046c maṇipūrapater deśam upāyāt sahapāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: maṇipūra pateḥ deśam upāyāt saha pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 14,078.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 14,078.001a śrutvā tu nṛpatir vīraṃ pitaraṃ babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu nṛpatiḥ vīram pitaram babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,078.001c niryayau vinayenāryo brāhmaṇārghyapuraḥsaraḥ
analyzed: niryayau vinayena āryaḥ brāhmaṇa arghya puraḥsaraḥ

original: 14,078.002a maṇipūreśvaraṃ tv evam upayātaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: maṇipūra īśvaram tu evam upayātam dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,078.002c nābhyanandata medhāvī kṣatradharmam anusmaran
analyzed: na abhyanandata medhāvī kṣatra dharmam anusmaran

original: 14,078.003a uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā samanyuḥ phalgunas tadā
analyzed: uvāca ca enam dharma ātmā sa manyuḥ phalgunaḥ tadā

original: 14,078.003c prakriyeyaṃ na te yuktā bahis tvaṃ kṣatradharmataḥ
analyzed: prakriyā iyam na te yuktā bahis tvam kṣatra dharmataḥ

original: 14,078.004a saṃrakṣyamāṇaṃ turagaṃ yaudhiṣṭhiram upāgatam
analyzed: saṃrakṣyamāṇam turagam yaudhiṣṭhiram upāgatam

original: 14,078.004c yajñiyaṃ viṣayānte māṃ nāyotsīḥ kiṃ nu putraka
analyzed: yajñiyam viṣaya ante mām na ayotsīḥ kim nu putraka

original: 14,078.005a dhik tvām astu sudurbuddhiṃ kṣatradharmāviśāradam
analyzed: dhik tvām astu su durbuddhim kṣatra dharma a viśāradam

original: 14,078.005c yo māṃ yuddhāya saṃprāptaṃ sāmnaivātho tvam agrahīḥ
analyzed: yaḥ mām yuddhāya saṃprāptam sāmnā eva atha u tvam agrahīḥ

original: 14,078.006a na tvayā puruṣārthaś ca kaś cid astīha jīvatā
analyzed: na tvayā puruṣa arthaḥ ca kaḥ cit asti iha jīvatā

original: 14,078.006c yas tvaṃ strīvad yudhā prāptaṃ sāmnā māṃ pratyagṛhṇathāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam strī vat yudhā prāptam sāmnā mām pratyagṛhṇathāḥ

original: 14,078.007a yady ahaṃ nyastaśastras tvām āgaccheyaṃ sudurmate
analyzed: yadi aham nyasta śastraḥ tvām āgaccheyam su durmate

original: 14,078.007c prakriyeyaṃ tato yuktā bhavet tava narādhama
analyzed: prakriyā iyam tatas yuktā bhavet tava nara adhama

original: 14,078.008a tam evam uktaṃ bhartrā tu viditvā pannagātmajā
analyzed: tam evam uktam bhartrā tu viditvā pannaga ātmajā

original: 14,078.008c amṛṣyamāṇā bhittvorvīm ulūpī tam upāgamat
analyzed: a mṛṣyamāṇā bhittvā urvīm ulūpī tam upāgamat

original: 14,078.009a sā dadarśa tataḥ putraṃ vimṛśantam adhomukham
analyzed: sā dadarśa tatas putram vimṛśantam adhomukham

original: 14,078.009c saṃtarjyamānam asakṛd bhartrā yuddhārthinā vibho
analyzed: saṃtarjyamānam asakṛt bhartrā yuddha arthinā vibho

original: 14,078.010a tataḥ sā cārusarvāṅgī tam upetyoragātmajā
analyzed: tatas sā cāru sarva aṅgī tam upetya uraga ātmajā

original: 14,078.010c ulūpī prāha vacanaṃ kṣatradharmaviśāradā
analyzed: ulūpī prāha vacanam kṣatra dharma viśāradā

original: 14,078.011a ulūpīṃ māṃ nibodha tvaṃ mātaraṃ pannagātmajām
analyzed: ulūpīm mām nibodha tvam mātaram pannaga ātmajām

original: 14,078.011c kuruṣva vacanaṃ putra dharmas te bhavitā paraḥ
analyzed: kuruṣva vacanam putra dharmaḥ te bhavitā paraḥ

original: 14,078.012a yudhyasvainaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ dhanaṃjayam ariṃdama
analyzed: yudhyasva enam kuru śreṣṭham dhanaṃjayam ariṃdama

original: 14,078.012c evam eṣa hi te prīto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: evam eṣa hi te prītaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 14,078.013a evam uddharṣito mātrā sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: evam ud harṣitaḥ mātrā sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,078.013c manaś cakre mahātejā yuddhāya bharatarṣabha
analyzed: manaḥ cakre mahā tejāḥ yuddhāya bharata ṛṣabha

original: 14,078.014a saṃnahya kāñcanaṃ varma śirastrāṇaṃ ca bhānumat
analyzed: saṃnahya kāñcanam varma śirastrāṇam ca bhānumat

original: 14,078.014c tūṇīraśatasaṃbādham āruroha mahāratham
analyzed: tūṇīra śata saṃbādham āruroha mahā ratham

original: 14,078.015a sarvopakaraṇair yuktaṃ yuktam aśvair manojavaiḥ
analyzed: sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yuktam yuktam aśvaiḥ manojavaiḥ

original: 14,078.015c sucakropaskaraṃ dhīmān hemabhāṇḍapariṣkṛtam
analyzed: su cakra upaskaram dhīmān hema bhāṇḍa pariṣkṛtam

original: 14,078.016a paramārcitam ucchritya dhvajaṃ siṃhaṃ hiraṇmayam
analyzed: parama arcitam ucchritya dhvajam siṃham hiraṇmayam

original: 14,078.016c prayayau pārtham uddiśya sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: prayayau pārtham uddiśya sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,078.017a tato 'bhyetya hayaṃ vīro yajñiyaṃ pārtharakṣitam
analyzed: tatas bhyetya hayam vīraḥ yajñiyam pārtha rakṣitam

original: 14,078.017c grāhayām āsa puruṣair hayaśikṣāviśāradaiḥ

original: 14,080.019a na hi me pitaraṃ hatvā niṣkṛtir vidyate kva cit
analyzed: na hi me pitaram hatvā niṣkṛtiḥ vidyate kva cit

original: 14,080.019c narakaṃ pratipatsyāmi dhruvaṃ guruvadhārditaḥ
analyzed: narakam pratipatsyāmi dhruvam guru vadha arditaḥ

original: 14,080.020a vīraṃ hi kṣatriyaṃ hatvā gośatena pramucyate
analyzed: vīram hi kṣatriyam hatvā go śatena pramucyate

original: 14,080.020c pitaraṃ tu nihatyaivaṃ dustarā niṣkṛtir mayā
analyzed: pitaram tu nihatya evam dustarā niṣkṛtiḥ mayā

original: 14,080.021a eṣa hy eko mahātejāḥ pāṇḍuputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: eṣa hi ekaḥ mahā tejāḥ pāṇḍu putraḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,080.021c pitā ca mama dharmātmā tasya me niṣkṛtiḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: pitā ca mama dharma ātmā tasya me niṣkṛtiḥ kutas

original: 14,080.022a ity evam uktvā nṛpate dhanaṃjayasuto nṛpaḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktvā nṛpate dhanaṃjaya sutaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 14,080.022c upaspṛśyābhavat tūṣṇīṃ prāyopeto mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: upaspṛśya abhavat tūṣṇīm prāya upetaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: 14,081.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 14,081.001a prāyopaviṣṭe nṛpatau maṇipūreśvare tadā
analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭe nṛpatau maṇipūra īśvare tadā

original: 14,081.001c pitṛśokasamāviṣṭe saha mātrā paraṃtapa
analyzed: pitṛ śoka samāviṣṭe saha mātrā paraṃtapa

original: 14,081.002a ulūpī cintayām āsa tadā saṃjīvanaṃ maṇim
analyzed: ulūpī cintayām āsa tadā saṃjīvanam maṇim

original: 14,081.002c sa copātiṣṭhata tadā pannagānāṃ parāyaṇam
analyzed: sa ca upātiṣṭhata tadā pannagānām parāyaṇam

original: 14,081.003a taṃ gṛhītvā tu kauravya nāgarājapateḥ sutā
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā tu kauravya nāga rāja pateḥ sutā

original: 14,081.003c manaḥprahlādanīṃ vācaṃ sainikānām athābravīt
analyzed: manaḥ prahlādanīm vācam sainikānām atha abravīt

original: 14,081.004a uttiṣṭha mā śucaḥ putra naiṣa jiṣṇus tvayā hataḥ
analyzed: uttiṣṭha mā śucaḥ putra na eṣa jiṣṇuḥ tvayā hataḥ

original: 14,081.004c ajeyaḥ puruṣair eṣa devair vāpi savāsavaiḥ
analyzed: ajeyaḥ puruṣaiḥ eṣa devaiḥ vā api sa vāsavaiḥ

original: 14,081.005a mayā tu mohinī nāma māyaiṣā saṃprayojitā
analyzed: mayā tu mohinī nāma māyā eṣā saṃprayojitā

original: 14,081.005c priyārthaṃ puruṣendrasya pitus te 'dya yaśasvinaḥ
analyzed: priya artham puruṣa indrasya pituḥ te dya yaśasvinaḥ

original: 14,081.006a jijñāsur hy eṣa vai putra balasya tava kauravaḥ
analyzed: jijñāsuḥ hi eṣa vai putra balasya tava kauravaḥ

original: 14,081.006c saṃgrāme yudhyato rājann āgataḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: saṃgrāme yudhyataḥ rājan āgataḥ para vīra hā

original: 14,081.007a tasmād asi mayā putra yuddhārthaṃ paricoditaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt asi mayā putra yuddha artham paricoditaḥ

original: 14,081.007c mā pāpam ātmanaḥ putra śaṅkethās tv aṇv api prabho
analyzed: mā pāpam ātmanaḥ putra śaṅkethāḥ tu aṇu api prabho

original: 14,081.008a ṛṣir eṣa mahātejāḥ puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ eṣa mahā tejāḥ puruṣaḥ śāśvataḥ vyayaḥ

original: 14,081.008c nainaṃ śakto hi saṃgrāme jetuṃ śakro 'pi putraka
analyzed: na enam śaktaḥ hi saṃgrāme jetum śakraḥ pi putraka

original: 14,081.009a ayaṃ tu me maṇir divyaḥ samānīto viśāṃ pate
analyzed: ayam tu me maṇiḥ divyaḥ samānītaḥ viśām pate

original: 14,081.009c mṛtān mṛtān pannagendrān yo jīvayati nityadā
analyzed: jīvayati

original: 14,081.010a etam asyorasi tvaṃ tu sthāpayasva pituḥ prabho
analyzed: etam asya urasi tvam tu sthāpayasva pituḥ prabho

original: 14,081.010c saṃjīvitaṃ punaḥ putra tato draṣṭāsi pāṇḍavam
analyzed: saṃjīvitam punar putra tatas draṣṭāsi pāṇḍavam

original: 14,081.011a ity uktaḥ sthāpayām āsa tasyorasi maṇiṃ tadā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sthāpayām āsa tasya urasi maṇim tadā

original: 14,081.011c pārthasyāmitatejāḥ sa pituḥ snehād apāpakṛt
analyzed: pārthasya amita tejāḥ sa pituḥ snehāt a pāpa kṛt

original: 14,081.012a tasmin nyaste maṇau vīra jiṣṇur ujjīvitaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tasmin nyaste maṇau vīra jiṣṇuḥ ujjīvitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 14,081.012c suptotthita ivottasthau mṛṣṭalohitalocanaḥ
analyzed: supta utthitaḥ iva uttasthau mṛṣṭa lohita locanaḥ

original: 14,081.013a tam utthitaṃ mahātmānaṃ labdhasaṃjñaṃ manasvinam
analyzed: tam utthitam mahātmānam labdha saṃjñam manasvinam

original: 14,081.013c samīkṣya pitaraṃ svasthaṃ vavande babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: samīkṣya pitaram svastham vavande babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,081.014a utthite puruṣavyāghre punar lakṣmīvati prabho
analyzed: utthite puruṣa vyāghre punar lakṣmīvati prabho

original: 14,081.014c divyāḥ sumanasaḥ puṇyā vavṛṣe pākaśāsanaḥ
analyzed: divyāḥ sumanasaḥ puṇyāḥ vavṛṣe pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 14,081.015a anāhatā dundubhayaḥ praṇedur meghanisvanāḥ
analyzed: an āhatāḥ dundubhayaḥ praṇeduḥ megha nisvanāḥ

original: 14,081.015c sādhu sādhv iti cākāśe babhūva sumahān svanaḥ
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti ca ākāśe babhūva su mahān svanaḥ

original: 14,081.016a utthāya tu mahābāhuḥ paryāśvasto dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: utthāya tu mahā bāhuḥ paryāśvastaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,081.016c babhruvāhanam āliṅgya samājighrata mūrdhani
analyzed: babhruvāhanam āliṅgya samājighrata mūrdhani

original: 14,081.017a dadarśa cāvidūre 'sya mātaraṃ śokakarśitām
analyzed: dadarśa ca avidūre sya mātaram śoka karśitām

original: 14,081.017c ulūpyā saha tiṣṭhantīṃ tato 'pṛcchad dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: ulūpyā saha tiṣṭhantīm pṛcchat dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 14,081.018a kim idaṃ lakṣyate sarvaṃ śokavismayaharṣavat
analyzed: kim idam lakṣyate sarvam śoka vismaya harṣavat

original: 14,081.018c raṇājiram amitraghna yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
analyzed: raṇa ajiram amitra ghna yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me

original: 14,081.019a jananī ca kimarthaṃ te raṇabhūmim upāgatā
analyzed: jananī ca kimartham te raṇa bhūmim upāgatā

original: 14,081.019c nāgendraduhitā ceyam ulūpī kim ihāgatā
analyzed: nāga indra duhitā ca iyam ulūpī kim iha āgatā

original: 14,081.020a jānāmy aham idaṃ yuddhaṃ tvayā madvacanāt kṛtam
analyzed: jānāmi aham idam yuddham tvayā mad vacanāt kṛtam

original: 14,081.020c strīṇām āgamane hetum aham icchāmi veditum
analyzed: strīṇām āgamane hetum aham icchāmi veditum

original: 14,081.021a tam uvāca tataḥ pṛṣṭo maṇipūrapatis tadā
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas pṛṣṭaḥ maṇipūra patiḥ tadā

original: 14,081.021c prasādya śirasā vidvān ulūpī pṛcchyatām iti
analyzed: prasādya śirasā vidvān ulūpī pṛcchyatām iti

original: 14,082.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: 14,082.001a kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te kauravyakulanandini
analyzed: kim āgamana kṛtyam te kauravya kula nandini

original: 14,082.001c maṇipūrapater mātus tathaiva ca raṇājire
analyzed: maṇipūra pateḥ mātuḥ tathā eva ca raṇa ajire

original: 14,082.002a kaccit kuśalakāmāsi rājño 'sya bhujagātmaje
analyzed: kaccit kuśala kāmā asi rājñaḥ sya bhujaga ātmaje

original: 14,082.002c mama vā cañcalāpāṅge kaccit tvaṃ śubham icchasi
analyzed: mama vā cañcala apāṅge kaccit tvam śubham icchasi

original: 14,082.003a kaccit te pṛthulaśroṇi nāpriyaṃ śubhadarśane
analyzed: kaccit te pṛthula śroṇi na apriyam śubha darśane

original: 14,082.003c akārṣam aham ajñānād ayaṃ vā babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: akārṣam aham ajñānāt ayam vā babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,082.004a kaccic ca rājaputrī te sapatnī caitravāhinī
analyzed: kaccit ca rāja putrī te sapatnī caitravāhinī

original: 14,082.004c citrāṅgadā varārohā nāparādhyati kiṃ cana
analyzed: citrāṅgadā varārohā na aparādhyati kim cana

original: 14,082.005a tam uvācoragapater duhitā prahasanty atha
analyzed: tam uvāca uraga pateḥ duhitā prahasantī atha

original: 14,082.005c na me tvam aparāddho 'si na nṛpo babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: na me tvam aparāddhaḥ si na nṛpaḥ babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,082.005e na janitrī tathāsyeyaṃ mama yā preṣyavat sthitā
analyzed: na janitrī tathā asya iyam mama yā preṣya vat sthitā

original: 14,082.006a śrūyatāṃ yad yathā cedaṃ mayā sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam
analyzed: śrūyatām yat yathā ca idam mayā sarvam viceṣṭitam

original: 14,082.006c na me kopas tvayā kāryaḥ śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
analyzed: na me kopaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ śirasā tvām prasādaye

original: 14,082.007a tvatprītyarthaṃ hi kauravya kṛtam etan mayānagha
analyzed: tvad prīti artham hi kauravya kṛtam etat mayā anagha

original: 14,082.007c yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho nikhilena dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yat tat śṛṇu mahā bāho nikhilena dhanaṃjaya

original: 14,082.008a mahābhāratayuddhe yat tvayā śāṃtanavo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: mahābhārata yuddhe yat tvayā śāṃtanavaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 14,082.008c adharmeṇa hataḥ pārtha tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā
analyzed: adharmeṇa hataḥ pārtha tasya eṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā

original: 14,082.009a na hi bhīṣmas tvayā vīra yudhyamāno nipātitaḥ
analyzed: na hi bhīṣmaḥ tvayā vīra yudhyamānaḥ nipātitaḥ

original: 14,082.009c śikhaṇḍinā tu saṃsaktas tam āśritya hatas tvayā
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinā tu saṃsaktaḥ tam āśritya hataḥ tvayā

original: 14,082.010a tasya śāntim akṛtvā tu tyajes tvaṃ yadi jīvitam
analyzed: tasya śāntim a kṛtvā tu tyajeḥ tvam yadi jīvitam

original: 14,082.010c karmaṇā tena pāpena patethā niraye dhruvam
analyzed: karmaṇā tena pāpena patethāḥ niraye dhruvam

original: 14,082.011a eṣā tu vihitā śāntiḥ putrād yāṃ prāptavān asi
analyzed: eṣā tu vihitā śāntiḥ putrāt yām prāptavān asi

original: 14,082.011c vasubhir vasudhāpāla gaṅgayā ca mahāmate
analyzed: vasubhiḥ vasudhā pāla gaṅgayā ca mahāmate

original: 14,082.012a purā hi śrutam etad vai vasubhiḥ kathitaṃ mayā
analyzed: purā hi śrutam etat vai vasubhiḥ kathitam mayā

original: 14,082.012c gaṅgāyās tīram āgamya hate śāṃtanave nṛpe
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ tīram āgamya hate śāṃtanave nṛpe

original: 14,082.013a āplutya devā vasavaḥ sametya ca mahānadīm
analyzed: āplutya devāḥ vasavaḥ sametya ca mahā nadīm

original: 14,082.013c idam ūcur vaco ghoraṃ bhāgīrathyā mate tadā
analyzed: idam ūcuḥ vacaḥ ghoram bhāgīrathyāḥ mate tadā

original: 14,082.014a eṣa śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo nihataḥ savyasācinā
analyzed: eṣa śāṃtanavaḥ bhīṣmaḥ nihataḥ savyasācinā

original: 14,082.014c ayudhyamānaḥ saṃgrāme saṃsakto 'nyena bhāmini
analyzed: ayudhyamānaḥ saṃgrāme saṃsaktaḥ bhāmini

original: 14,082.015a tad anenābhiṣaṅgeṇa vayam apy arjunaṃ śubhe
analyzed: tat anena abhiṣaṅgeṇa vayam api arjunam śubhe

original: 14,082.015c śāpena yojayāmeti tathāstv iti ca sābravīt
analyzed: śāpena yojayāma iti tathā astu iti ca sā abravīt

original: 14,082.016a tad ahaṃ pitur āvedya bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyā
analyzed: tat aham pituḥ āvedya bhṛśam pravyathita indriyā

original: 14,082.016c abhavaṃ sa ca tac chrutvā viṣādam agamat param
analyzed: abhavam sa ca tat śrutvā viṣādam agamat param

original: 14,082.017a pitā tu me vasūn gatvā tvadarthaṃ samayācata
analyzed: pitā tu me vasūn gatvā tvad artham samayācata

original: 14,082.017c punaḥ punaḥ prasādyaināṃs ta enam idam abruvan
analyzed: punar punar prasādya enān te enam idam abruvan

original: 14,082.018a punas tasya mahābhāga maṇipūreśvaro yuvā
analyzed: punar tasya mahābhāga maṇipūra īśvaraḥ yuvā

original: 14,082.018c sa enaṃ raṇamadhyasthaṃ śaraiḥ pātayitā bhuvi
analyzed: saḥ enam raṇa madhya stham śaraiḥ pātayitā bhuvi

original: 14,082.019a evaṃ kṛte sa nāgendra muktaśāpo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: evam kṛte sa nāga indra mukta śāpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 14,082.019c gaccheti vasubhiś cokto mama cedaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ
analyzed: gaccha iti vasubhiḥ ca uktaḥ mama ca idam śaśaṃsa saḥ

original: 14,082.020a tac chrutvā tvaṃ mayā tasmāc chāpād asi vimokṣitaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā tvam mayā tasmāt śāpāt asi vimokṣitaḥ

original: 14,082.020c na hi tvāṃ devarājo 'pi samareṣu parājayet
analyzed: na hi tvām devarājaḥ u pi samareṣu parājayet

original: 14,082.021a ātmā putraḥ smṛtas tasmāt tenehāsi parājitaḥ
analyzed: ātmā putraḥ smṛtaḥ tasmāt tena iha asi parājitaḥ

original: 14,082.021c nātra doṣo mama mataḥ kathaṃ vā manyase vibho
analyzed: na atra doṣaḥ mama mataḥ katham vā manyase vibho

original: 14,082.022a ity evam ukto vijayaḥ prasannātmābravīd idam
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ vijayaḥ prasanna ātmā abravīt idam

original: 14,082.022c sarvaṃ me supriyaṃ devi yad etat kṛtavaty asi
analyzed: sarvam me su priyam devi yat etat kṛtavatī asi

original: 14,082.023a ity uktvāthābravīt putraṃ maṇipūreśvaraṃ jayaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā atha abravīt putram maṇipūra īśvaram jayaḥ

original: 14,082.023c citrāṅgadāyāḥ śṛṇvantyāḥ kauravyaduhitus tathā
analyzed: citrāṅgadāyāḥ śṛṇvantyāḥ kauravya duhituḥ tathā

original: 14,082.024a yudhiṣṭhirasyāśvamedhaḥ parāṃ caitrīṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya aśvamedhaḥ parām caitrīm bhaviṣyati

original: 14,082.024c tatrāgaccheḥ sahāmātyo mātṛbhyāṃ sahito nṛpa
analyzed: tatra āgaccheḥ saha amātyaḥ mātṛbhyām sahitaḥ nṛpa

original: 14,082.025a ity evam uktaḥ pārthena sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ pārthena sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ

original: 14,082.025c uvāca pitaraṃ dhīmān idam asrāvilekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: uvāca pitaram dhīmān idam asra āvila īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 14,082.026a upayāsyāmi dharmajña bhavataḥ śāsanād aham
analyzed: upayāsyāmi dharma jña bhavataḥ śāsanāt aham

original: 14,082.026c aśvamedhe mahāyajñe dvijātipariveṣakaḥ
14,082.027a mama tv anugrahārthāya praviśasva puraṃ svakam
analyzed: mama tu anugraha arthāya praviśasva puram svakam

original: 14,082.027c bhāryābhyāṃ saha śatrughna mā bhūt te 'tra vicāraṇā
analyzed: bhāryābhyām saha śatrughna mā bhūt te vicāraṇā

original: 14,082.028a uṣitveha viśalyas tvaṃ sukhaṃ sve veśmani prabho
analyzed: uṣitvā iha viśalyaḥ tvam sukham sve veśmani prabho

original: 14,082.028c punar aśvānugamanaṃ kartāsi jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: punar aśva anugamanam kartāsi jayatām vara

original: 14,082.029a ity uktaḥ sa tu putreṇa tadā vānaraketanaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tu putreṇa tadā vānaraketanaḥ

original: 14,082.029c smayan provāca kaunteyas tadā citrāṅgadāsutam
analyzed: smayan provāca kaunteyaḥ tadā citrāṅgadā sutam

original: 14,082.030a viditaṃ te mahābāho yathā dīkṣāṃ carāmy aham
analyzed: viditam te mahā bāho yathā dīkṣām carāmi aham

original: 14,082.030c na sa tāvat pravekṣyāmi puraṃ te pṛthulocana
analyzed: na sa tāvat pravekṣyāmi puram te pṛthu locana

original: 14,082.031a yathākāmaṃ prayāty eṣa yajñiyaś ca turaṃgamaḥ
analyzed: yathākāmam prayāti eṣa yajñiyaḥ ca turaṃgamaḥ

original: 14,082.031c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi na sthānaṃ vidyate mama
analyzed: svasti te stu gamiṣyāmi na sthānam vidyate mama

original: 14,082.032a sa tatra vidhivat tena pūjitaḥ pākaśāsaniḥ
analyzed: sa tatra vidhivat tena pūjitaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 14,082.032c bhāryābhyām abhyanujñātaḥ prāyād bharatasattamaḥ
analyzed: bhāryābhyām abhyanujñātaḥ prāyāt bharata sattamaḥ

original: 14,083.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 14,083.001a sa tu vājī samudrāntāṃ paryetya pṛthivīm imām
analyzed: sa tu vājī samudra antām paryetya pṛthivīm imām

original: 14,083.001c nivṛtto 'bhimukho rājan yena nāgāhvayaṃ puram
analyzed: nivṛttaḥ abhimukhaḥ rājan yena nāgāhvayam puram

original: 14,083.002a anugacchaṃś ca tejasvī nivṛtto 'tha kirīṭabhṛt
analyzed: anugacchan ca tejasvī kirīṭabhṛt

original: 14,083.002c yadṛcchayā samāpede puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ tadā
analyzed: yadṛcchayā samāpede puram rājagṛham tadā

original: 14,083.003a tam abhyāśagataṃ rājā jarāsaṃdhātmajātmajaḥ
analyzed: tam abhyāśa gatam rājā jarāsaṃdha ātmaja ātmajaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2614 ābhimukhyena homas tu yasya yajñeṣu vartate
analyzed: ābhimukhyena homaḥ tu yasya yajñeṣu vartate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2615 tenāpy āhavanīyatvaṃ gato vahnir mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: tena api āhavanīya tvam gataḥ vahniḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2616 ā homād yo 'gnihotreṣu yajñe vā yatra sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: ā homāt yaḥ gnihotreṣu yajñe vā yatra sarvaśas

original: 14,096.015d@004_2617 yasmād asmin pravartante tato hy āhavanīyatā
analyzed: yasmāt asmin pravartante tatas hi āhavanīya tā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2618 yas tv āvasathyaṃ juhuyān mūlāgniṃ vidhivad dvijaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu āvasathyam juhuyāt mūlāgnim vidhivat dvijaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2619 sa tu saptarṣilokeṣu sapatnīkaḥ pramodate
analyzed: sa tu saptarṣi lokeṣu sa patnīkaḥ pramodate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2620 yaś cāpy upāsate sabhyaṃ vidhivat prayatātmavān
analyzed: yaḥ ca api upāsate sabhyam vidhivat prayata ātmavān

original: 14,096.015d@004_2621 jayet sa vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ tathā tv ṛṣisabhām api
analyzed: jayet sa vāc mayam sarvam tathā tu ṛṣi sabhām api

original: 14,096.015d@004_2622 agnīnām atha vāgnes tu yasya homaḥ pradīyate
analyzed: agnīnām atha vā agneḥ tu yasya homaḥ pradīyate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2623 iṣṭo bhavati sarvāgner agnihotraṃ ca tad bhavet
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ bhavati sarva agneḥ agnihotram ca tat bhavet

original: 14,096.015d@004_2624 trayāṇāṃ yajamānasya cāturhotram iti smṛtam
analyzed: trayāṇām yajamānasya cāturhotram iti smṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2625 ho ity eva viṣādo vai viṣādo duḥkham ucyate
analyzed: ho iti eva viṣādaḥ vai viṣādaḥ duḥkham ucyate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2626 duḥkhaṃ tāpatrayaṃ proktaṃ tāpaṃ hi narakaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: duḥkham tāpa trayam proktam tāpam hi narakam viduḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2627 tasmād vai trāyate duḥkhād yajamānaṃ huto 'nalaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vai trāyate duḥkhāt yajamānam hutaḥ nalaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2628 tasmāt tu vidhivat proktam agnihotram iti śrutau
analyzed: tasmāt tu vidhivat proktam agnihotram iti śrutau

original: 14,096.015d@004_2629 tad agnihotraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ vai brahmaṇā lokakartṛṇā
analyzed: tat agnihotram sṛṣṭam vai brahmaṇā loka kartṛṇā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2630 vedāś cāpy agnihotrārthaṃ jajñire svayam eva tu
analyzed: vedāḥ ca api agnihotra artham jajñire svayam eva tu

original: 14,096.015d@004_2631 agnihotraphalā vedā śīlavṛttaphalaṃ śrutam
analyzed: agnihotra phalā vedā śīla vṛtta phalam śrutam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2632 ratiputraphalā dārā dānabhogaphalaṃ dhanam
analyzed: rati putra phalāḥ dārāḥ dāna bhoga phalam dhanam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2633 trivedamantrasaṃyogād agnihotraṃ pravartate
analyzed: tri veda mantra saṃyogāt agnihotram pravartate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2634 ṛgyajuḥsāmabhiḥ puṇyaiḥ sthāpyate sūtrasaṃyutaiḥ
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāmabhiḥ puṇyaiḥ sthāpyate sūtra saṃyutaiḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2635 vasante brāhmaṇasya syād ādheyo 'gnir narādhipa
analyzed: vasante brāhmaṇasya syāt ādheyaḥ gniḥ narādhipa

original: 14,096.015d@004_2636 vasanto brāhmaṇaḥ prokto vedayoniḥ sa ucyate
analyzed: vasantaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ proktaḥ veda yoniḥ saḥ ucyate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2637 agnyādheyaṃ tu yenātha vasante kriyate nṛpa
analyzed: agnyādheyam tu yena atha vasante kriyate nṛpa

original: 14,096.015d@004_2638 tasya śrīr brahmavṛddhiś ca brāhmaṇasya vivardhate
analyzed: tasya śrīḥ brahma vṛddhiḥ ca brāhmaṇasya vivardhate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2639 kṣatriyasyāgnir ādheyo grīṣme śreṣṭhaḥ sa vai nṛpa
analyzed: kṣatriyasya agniḥ ādheyaḥ grīṣme śreṣṭhaḥ sa vai nṛpa

original: 14,096.015d@004_2640 yenādhānaṃ tu vai grīṣme kriyate tasya vardhate
analyzed: yena ādhānam tu vai grīṣme kriyate tasya vardhate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2641 śrīḥ prajāḥ paśavaś caiva vittaṃ tejo balaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: śrīḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ ca eva vittam tejaḥ balam yaśaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2642 śaradrātre 'tha vaiśyasya hy ādhānīyo hutāśanaḥ
analyzed: śarad rātre vaiśyasya hi ādhānīyaḥ hutāśanaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2643 śaradrātraṃ svayaṃ vaiśyo vaiśyayoniḥ sa ucyate
analyzed: śarad rātram svayam vaiśyaḥ vaiśya yoniḥ saḥ ucyate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2644 śarady ādhānam evaṃ vai kriyate yena pāṇḍava
analyzed: śaradi ādhānam evam vai kriyate yena pāṇḍava

original: 14,096.015d@004_2645 tasyāpi śrīḥ prajāyuś ca paśavo 'rthaś ca vardhate
analyzed: tasya api śrīḥ prajā āyuḥ ca paśavaḥ ṛthaḥ ca vardhate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2646 paśavaḥ sarva evaite tribhir vedair alaṃkṛtāḥ
analyzed: paśavaḥ sarve eva ete tribhiḥ vedaiḥ alaṃkṛtāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2647 agnihotrāt pravartante yair idaṃ dhriyate jagat
analyzed: agnihotrāt pravartante yaiḥ idam dhriyate jagat

original: 14,096.015d@004_2648 grāmyāraṇyāś ca paśavas tathā vṛkṣās tṛṇāni ca
analyzed: grāmya āraṇyāḥ ca paśavaḥ tathā vṛkṣāḥ tṛṇāni ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2649 phalāny oṣadhayaś cāpi hy agnihotrakṛte hi tāḥ
analyzed: phalāni oṣadhayaḥ ca api hi agnihotra kṛte hi tāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2650 rasāḥ snehās tathā gandhā ratnāni maṇayas tathā
analyzed: rasāḥ snehāḥ tathā gandhāḥ ratnāni maṇayaḥ tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2651 kāñcanāni ca lohāni hy agnihotrakṛte 'bhavan
analyzed: kāñcanāni ca lohāni hi agnihotra kṛte bhavan

original: 14,096.015d@004_2652 āyurvedo dhanurvedo mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ
14,096.015d@004_2653 dharmaśāstraṃ ca tat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
analyzed: dharma śāstram ca tat sarvam agnihotra kṛte kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2654 chandaḥ śikṣāś ca kalpāś ca tathā vyākaraṇaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: chandaḥ śikṣāḥ ca kalpāḥ ca tathā vyākaraṇam nṛpa

original: 14,096.015d@004_2655 śāstraṃ jyotir niruktaṃ cāpy agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
analyzed: śāstram jyotiḥ niruktam ca api agnihotra kṛte kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2656 itihāsapurāṇaṃ ca gāthāś copaniṣat tathā
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇam ca gāthāḥ ca upaniṣad tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2657 ātharvaṇāni karmāṇi cāgnihotrakṛte kṛtam
analyzed: ātharvaṇāni karmāṇi ca agnihotra kṛte kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2658 yac caitasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi kiṃ cid asti carācaram
analyzed: yat ca etasyām pṛthivyām hi kim cit asti carācaram

original: 14,096.015d@004_2659 tat sarvam agnihotrasya kṛte sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
analyzed: tat sarvam agnihotrasya kṛte sṛṣṭam svayaṃbhuvā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2660 agnihotrasya darśasya paurṇamāsasya cāpy atha
analyzed: agnihotrasya darśasya paurṇamāsasya ca api atha

original: 14,096.015d@004_2661 yūpeṣṭipaśubandhānāṃ somapānakriyāvatām
analyzed: yūpa iṣṭi paśubandhānām soma pāna kriyāvatām

original: 14,096.015d@004_2662 tithinakṣatrayogānāṃ muhūrtakaraṇātmanām
analyzed: tithi nakṣatra yogānām muhūrta karaṇa ātmanām

original: 14,096.015d@004_2663 kālasya vedanārthaṃ tu jyotirjñānaṃ kṛtaṃ purā
analyzed: kālasya vedana artham tu jyotiḥ jñānam kṛtam purā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2664 ṛgyajuḥsāmamantrāṇāṃ ślokatattvārthacintanāt
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma mantrāṇām śloka tattva artha cintanāt

original: 14,096.015d@004_2665 pratyāpattivikalpānāṃ chando jñānaṃ prakalpitam
analyzed: pratyāpatti vikalpānām chandaḥ jñānam prakalpitam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2666 varṇākṣarapadārthānāṃ saṃdhiliṅgaṃ vivakṣitam
analyzed: varṇa akṣara padārthānām saṃdhi liṅgam vivakṣitam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2667 nāmadhātuvivekārthaṃ purā vyākaraṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: nāmadhātu viveka artham purā vyākaraṇam kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2668 yūpavedy adhvarārthaṃ tu prokṣaṇaśravaṇāya tu
analyzed: yūpavedī adhvara artham tu prokṣaṇa śravaṇāya tu

original: 14,096.015d@004_2669 yajñadaivatayogārthaṃ śikṣājñānaṃ prakalpitam
analyzed: yajña daivata yoga artham śikṣā jñānam prakalpitam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2670 yajñapātrapavitrārthaṃ dravyasaṃbhāraṇāya ca
analyzed: yajña pātra pavitra artham dravya saṃbhāraṇāya ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2671 sarvayajñavikalpāya purākalpaṃ prakalpitam
analyzed: sarva yajña vikalpāya purākalpam prakalpitam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2672 nāmadhātuvibhaktīnāṃ tattvārthaniyamāya ca
analyzed: nāma dhātu vibhaktīnām tattva artha niyamāya ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2673 sarvavedaniruktānāṃ niruktam ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam
analyzed: sarva veda niruktānām niruktam ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2674 vedyarthaṃ pṛthivī sṛṣṭā saṃbhārārthaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: vedi artham pṛthivī sṛṣṭā saṃbhāra artham tathā eva ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2675 idhmārtham atha yūpārthaṃ brahmā cakre vanaspatim
analyzed: idhma artham atha yūpa artham brahmā cakre vanaspatim

original: 14,096.015d@004_2676 grāmyāraṇyāś ca paśavo jāyante yajñakāraṇāt
analyzed: grāmya āraṇyāḥ ca paśavaḥ jāyante yajña kāraṇāt

original: 14,096.015d@004_2677 mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaṃ ca proṣitā śrāvaṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: mantrāṇām viniyogam ca proṣitā śrāvaṇam tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2678 anūyājaprayājāṃś ca marutāṃ śaṃsinas tathā
analyzed: anūyāja prayājān ca marutām śaṃsinaḥ tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2679 udgātṝṃś caiva sāmnāṃ vai baliprasthānam eva ca
analyzed: udgātṝn ca eva sāmnām vai baliprasthānam eva ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2680 viṣṇukramāṇāṃ kramaṇaṃ dakṣiṇāvabhṛthaṃ tathā
analyzed: viṣṇukramāṇām kramaṇam dakṣiṇa avabhṛtham tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2681 trikālam arcanaṃ caiva sthāneṣūpahṛtaṃ tathā
analyzed: tri kālam arcanam ca eva sthāneṣu upahṛtam tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2682 devatāgrahaṇaṃ mokṣaṃ haviṣāṃ śravaṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: devatā grahaṇam mokṣam haviṣām śravaṇam tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2683 nāvabudhyanti ye viprā nindanti ca paśor vadham
analyzed: na avabudhyanti ye viprāḥ nindanti ca paśoḥ vadham

original: 14,096.015d@004_2684 te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ tamasāvṛtam
analyzed: te yānti narakam ghoram rauravam tamasā āvṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2685 śatavarṣasahasrāṇi tatra sthitvā narādhamāḥ
analyzed: śata varṣa sahasrāṇi tatra sthitvā nara adhamāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2686 krimibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca tiṣṭheyuḥ pūyaśoṇite
analyzed: krimibhiḥ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ ca tiṣṭheyuḥ pūya śoṇite

original: 14,096.015d@004_2687 yūpās tu mantrasaṃskārair eṣāṃ vai paśavas tathā
analyzed: yūpāḥ tu mantra saṃskāraiḥ eṣām vai paśavaḥ tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2688 yajamānena sahitāḥ svargaṃ yānti nareśvara
analyzed: yajamānena sahitāḥ svargam yānti nareśvara

original: 14,096.015d@004_2689 yāvat kālaṃ hi yajvā vai svargaloke mahīyate
analyzed: yāvat kālam hi yajvā vai svarga loke mahīyate

original: 14,096.015d@004_2690 tāvat kālaṃ pramodante paśavo hy adhvare hatāḥ
analyzed: tāvat kālam pramodante paśavaḥ hi adhvare hatāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2691 vṛkṣā yūpatvam icchanti paśutvaṃ paśavas tathā
analyzed: vṛkṣāḥ yūpa tvam icchanti paśu tvam paśavaḥ tathā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2692 tṛṇānīcchanti darbhatvam oṣadhyaś ca haviṣyatām
analyzed: tṛṇāni icchanti darbha tvam oṣadhyaḥ ca haviṣya tām

original: 14,096.015d@004_2693 somatvaṃ ca latāḥ sarvā veditvaṃ vai vasuṃdharā
analyzed: soma tvam ca latāḥ sarvāḥ vedi tvam vai vasuṃdharā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2694 yasmāt paśutvam icchanti paśavaḥ svargalipsayā
analyzed: yasmāt paśu tvam icchanti paśavaḥ svarga lipsayā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2695 tasmāt paśuvadhe hiṃsā nāsti yajñeṣu pāṇḍava
analyzed: tasmāt paśu vadhe hiṃsā na asti yajñeṣu pāṇḍava

original: 14,096.015d@004_2696 ahiṃsā vaidikaṃ karma brahmakarmeti tat smṛtam
analyzed: ahiṃsā vaidikam karma brahma karma iti tat smṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2697 vedoktaṃ ye na kurvanti hiṃsābuddhyā kratuṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: veda uktam ye na kurvanti hiṃsā buddhyā kratum dvijāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2698 sadyaḥ śūdratvam āyānti pretya caṇḍālatām api
analyzed: sadyas śūdra tvam āyānti pretya caṇḍāla tām api

original: 14,096.015d@004_2699 gāvo yajñārtham utpannā dakṣiṇārthaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: gāvaḥ yajña artham utpannāḥ dakṣiṇā artham tathā eva ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2700 suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva pātrī kumbhārtham eva ca
analyzed: suvarṇam rajatam ca eva pātrī kumbha artham eva ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2701 darbhāḥ saṃstaraṇārthaṃ tu rakṣasāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: darbhāḥ saṃstaraṇa artham tu rakṣasām rakṣaṇāya ca

original: 14,096.015d@004_2702 yajanārthaṃ dvijāḥ sṛṣṭās tārakā divi devatāḥ
analyzed: yajana artham dvijāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ tārakāḥ divi devatāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2703 kṣatriyā rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu vaiśyā vārtānimittataḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyāḥ rakṣaṇa artham tu vaiśyāḥ vārttā nimittataḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2704 śuśrūṣārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu śūdrāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
analyzed: śuśrūṣā artham trayāṇām tu śūdrāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: 14,096.015d@004_2705 evam etaj jagat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
analyzed: evam etat jagat sarvam agnihotra kṛte kṛtam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2706 nāvabudhyanti ye caitan narās tu tamasā vṛtāḥ
analyzed: na avabudhyanti ye ca etat narāḥ tu tamasā vṛtāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2707 te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ nāma viśrutam
analyzed: te yānti narakam ghoram rauravam nāma viśrutam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2708 rauravād vipramuktās tu krimiyoniṃ vrajanti te
analyzed: rauravāt vipramuktāḥ tu krimi yonim vrajanti te

original: 14,096.015d@004_2709 yathoktam agnihotrāṇāṃ śuśrūṣanti ca ye dvijāḥ
analyzed: yathā uktam agnihotrāṇām śuśrūṣanti ca ye dvijāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2710 tair dattaṃ suhutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ dattam adhyāpitaṃ bhavet
analyzed: taiḥ dattam su hutam ca iṣṭam dattam adhyāpitam bhavet

original: 14,096.015d@004_2711 evam iṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca yad vipraiḥ kriyate nṛpa
analyzed: evam iṣṭam ca pūrtam ca yat vipraiḥ kriyate nṛpa

original: 14,096.015d@004_2712 tat sarvaṃ samyag āhṛtya cāditye sthāpayāmy aham
analyzed: tat sarvam samyak āhṛtya ca āditye sthāpayāmi aham

original: 14,096.015d@004_2713 mayā sthāpitam āditye lokasya sukṛtaṃ hi tat
analyzed: mayā sthāpitam āditye lokasya su kṛtam hi tat

original: 14,096.015d@004_2714 dhārayet tat sahasrāṃśuḥ sukṛtaṃ hy agnihotriṇām
analyzed: dhārayet tat sahasrāṃśuḥ su kṛtam hi agnihotriṇām

original: 14,096.015d@004_2715 yāvat kālaṃ tu tiṣṭhanti loke cāpy agnihotriṇaḥ
analyzed: yāvat kālam tu tiṣṭhanti loke ca api agnihotriṇaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2716 tāvat teṣāṃ hi puṇyena dīpyante raviṇāmbare
analyzed: tāvat teṣām hi puṇyena dīpyante raviṇā ambare

original: 14,096.015d@004_2717 svarge svargaṃ gatānāṃ tu vīryād bhavati vīryavān
analyzed: svarge svargam gatānām tu vīryāt bhavati vīryavān

original: 14,096.015d@004_2718 tatra te hy upayuñjanti hy agnihotrasya yat phalam
analyzed: tatra te hi upayuñjanti hi agnihotrasya yat phalam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2719 samānarūpā devānāṃ tiṣṭhanty ābhūtasaṃplavam
analyzed: samāna rūpāḥ devānām tiṣṭhanti ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: 14,096.015d@004_2720 vṛthāgninā ca ye ke cid dahyante hy agnihotriṇaḥ
analyzed: vṛthāgninā ca ye ke cit dahyante hi agnihotriṇaḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2721 na te 'gnihotriṇāṃ lokaṃ manasāpi vrajanti vai
analyzed: na te gnihotriṇām lokam manasā api vrajanti vai

original: 14,096.015d@004_2722 vīraghnās te durācārāḥ sudaridrā narādhamāḥ
analyzed: vīra ghnāḥ te durācārāḥ su daridrāḥ nara adhamāḥ

original: 14,096.015d@004_2723 vikalā vyādhitāś cāpi jāyante śūdrayoniṣu
analyzed: vikalāḥ vyādhitāḥ ca api jāyante śūdra yoniṣu
